/wiki/Valmiki_Nagar_(Lok_Sabha_constitue: Valmiki Nagar Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 40 Lok Sabha ( parliamentary ) constituencies in Bihar state in eastern India . This constituency came into existence in 2008 , following delimitation of the parliamentary constituencies based on the recommendations of the Delimitation Commission of India constituted in 2002 .
/wiki/Paschim_Champaran_(Lok_Sabha_const: Paschim Champaran Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 40 Lok Sabha ( parliamentary ) constituencies in Bihar state in eastern India . This constituency came into existence in 2008 , following delimitation of the parliamentary constituencies based on the recommendations of the Delimitation Commission of India constituted in 2002 .
/wiki/Purvi_Champaran_(Lok_Sabha_constit: Purvi Champaran Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 40 Lok Sabha ( parliamentary ) constituencies in Bihar state in eastern India . This constituency came into existence in 2008 as a part of the implementation of delimitation of parliamentary constituencies based on the recommendations of the Delimitation Commission of India constituted in 2002 .
/wiki/Sheohar_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Sheohar Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 40 Lok Sabha ( parliamentary ) constituencies in the Indian state of Bihar . This constituency has been represented by veterans like Thakur Jugal Kishore Sinha an eminent freedom fighter and is known as the father of Cooperative Movement in India and Ram Dulari Sinha , former Union Minister and Governor .
/wiki/Sitamarhi_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Sitamarhi Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 40 Lok Sabha ( parliamentary ) constituencies in Bihar state in eastern India .
/wiki/Madhubani_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Madhubani Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 40 Lok Sabha ( parliamentary ) constituencies in Bihar state in eastern India .
/wiki/Jhanjharpur_(Lok_Sabha_constituenc: Jhanjharpur Lok Sabha constituency ( Hindi : झांझरपुर लोकसभा निर्वाचन क्षेत्र ) is one of the 40 Lok Sabha ( parliamentary ) constituencies in Bihar state in eastern India .
/wiki/Supaul_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Supaul Lok Sabha constituency ( Hindi : सुपौल लोकसभा निर्वाचन क्षेत्र ) is one of the 40 Lok Sabha ( parliamentary ) constituencies in Bihar state in eastern India . This constituency came into existence in 2008 as a part of the implementation of delimitation of parliamentary constituencies based on the recommendations of the Delimitation Commission of India constituted in 2002.and it 's sansad 2014_2019is ranjeet ranjan ( congress ) .
/wiki/Araria_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Araria Lok Sabha constituency ( Hindi : अररिया लोकसभा निर्वाचन क्षेत्र ) is one of the 40 Lok Sabha ( parliamentary ) constituencies in Bihar state in eastern India . It is unreserved .
/wiki/Kishanganj_(Lok_Sabha_constituency: Kishanganj Lok Sabha constituency ( Hindi : किशनगंज लोकसभा निर्वाचन क्षेत्र ) is one of the 40 Lok Sabha ( parliamentary ) constituencies in Bihar state in India
/wiki/Purnia_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Purnia Lok Sabha constituency ( formerly Purnea ) ( Hindi : पूर्णिया लोकसभा निर्वाचन क्षेत्र ) is one of the 40 Lok Sabha ( parliamentary ) constituencies in Bihar state in eastern India .
/wiki/Madhepura_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Madhepura Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 40 Lok Sabha constituencies in Bihar state in eastern India .
/wiki/Darbhanga_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Darbhanga Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 40 Lok Sabha ( parliamentary ) constituencies in Bihar state in eastern India .
/wiki/Muzaffarpur_(Lok_Sabha_constituenc: Muzaffarpur Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 40 Lok Sabha ( parliamentary ) constituencies in the Indian state of Bihar .
/wiki/Vaishali_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Vaishali Lok Sabha constituency ( Hindi : वैशाली लोकसभा निर्वाचन क्षेत्र ) is one of the 40 Lok Sabha constituencies in Bihar state in eastern India . The first Member of Parliament was Digvijay Narain Singh while the first woman to represent the constituency in Lok Sabha was Kishori Sinha .
/wiki/Gopalganj_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Gopalganj Lok Sabha constituency ( Hindi : गोपालगंज लोक सभा निर्वाचन क्षेत्र ) is one of the 40 Lok Sabha constituencies in Bihar state in eastern India .
/wiki/Siwan_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Siwan is a Lok Sabha constituency in Bihar .
/wiki/Maharajganj_(Bihar_Lok_Sabha_const: Maharajganj Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 40 Lok Sabha ( parliamentary ) constituencies in Bihar state in eastern India .
/wiki/Saran_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Saran Lok Sabha constituency is one of the 40 Lok Sabha ( parliamentary ) constituencies in Bihar state in eastern India . This constituency came into existence in 2008 as a part of the implementation of delimitation of parliamentary constituencies based on the recommendations of the Delimitation Commission of India constituted in 2002 . Before delimitation , it was Chapra ( Lok Sabha constituency ) .
